channel.title: MeeboMe
channel.description: Poster child of the Web 2.0 movement and all round general legends Meebo have just launched a new service called MeeboMe that allows you to host a flash based chat window on your website and allow people to send you...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Adrian+00:00
item.description: Doesn't seem to work in firefox 1.5.0.5 :(
item.dc:creator: Adrian

item.title: Comment by Martin+00:00
item.description:
I use that version of Firefox and it works just fine for me. Do you have the flash plugin installed?
Also - was this from behind a corporate proxy server? It may have been blocking the traffic.
Finally - I wasn't online at the time, maybe that was the problem.
UPDATED: I was updated to Firefox 1.5.0.6 today and it still works...
item.dc:creator: Martin
